title: Meet your Federal Government
brief_description: This film gives a detailed description of how the US Federal Government operates and a brief description of the meaning of such government to the citizens of the United Sates. Discusses the purpose and function of the three main branches of government; the Capitol or legislative branch; the White House or executive branch and the Supreme Court or judicial branch. Discusses the system of checks and balances which exists between these branches of government.
